sen.j: 凌雲集（りょううんしゅう）は、平安時代初期の弘仁5年（814年）に嵯峨天皇の命により編纂された日本初の勅撰漢詩集。
sen.e: Ryounshu (A collection from above the clouds) is the first anthology of Chinese poems in Japan, compiled by the command of Emperor Saga in 814 in the early Heian period.
Ryounshu (lit. a collection from above the clouds) is the first anthology of Chinese poems compiled in Japan by the command of Emperor Saga in 814 during the early Heian period.
sen.cmt: added "lit." for the description since it seemed to be a "literal" translation; fixed grammar
sen.e: Ryounshu (lit. a collection from above the clouds) is the first anthology of Chinese poems compiled in Japan by the command of Emperor Saga in 814 during the early Heian period.

sen.j: 全1巻で、正式名称は凌雲新集。
sen.e: The entire anthology is one volume and its official title is Ryouunshinshu.
sen.cmt: changed to present tense; added "entire" for 全; combined with the sentence below to reduce fragmentation
sen.e: The entire anthology is one volume and its official title is Ryouunshinshu.

sen.j: 小野岑守、菅原清公らによって編纂された。
sen.e: Ryounshu was compiled by a number of people including ONO no Minemori and SUGAWARA no Kiyokimi.
Ryounshu was compiled by a number of people, including ONO no Minemori and SUGAWARA no Kiyokimi.

sen.j: 作者は平城天皇、嵯峨天皇、淳和天皇ら23人で、全90首。
sen.e: There were 23 writers included Emperor Heijo, Emperor Saga and Emperor Junna composing a total of 90 poems.
Within the anthology, there were 23 writers, including Emperor Heijo, Emperor Saga and Emperor Junna composing a total of 90 poems.
sen.cmt: added "Within the anthology" to the beginning of the sentence

sen.j: なお、後に1首が加えられ、91首となって現在に伝わっている。
sen.e: One additional poem was subsequently added to the collection whereby the existing Ryuunshu consists of 91 poems.
